issue.title: [C++] Implement non-materializing sort kernels
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1566](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1566). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The output of such operator would be a permutation vector that if applied to a column, would result in the data being sorted like requested. This is similar to numpy's argsort functionality.
